name: How to Ruin your Space-Time Continuum
name_original: How to Ruin your Space-Time Continuum
description:
"An alchemist and his apprentice accidentally break the space-time continuum."

How to Ruin your Space-Time Continum is a retrowave/medieval shooter game.

Playable alone or with a friend, you must clear all rooms to win (and save the world ?)

Done in a week by Alexandre Iacono, Guiliane Le Roux and 

Cyrille de Monneron (me) for "a marathon" (a game jam from our school).

You can finish it quickly, so download it and have fun !
